_header: Lord Thy passion / Woe Thee thinketh ariseth thereon
Subjects: Passion, meditations on; Christ, Passion of
Bibliographic Ghosts:
Oxford, St John’s College 190, f. 135v (possibly confused with the one in Cambridge UK, St John’s College C.12 (62)?); Oxford, Bodleian Library Ashmole 360, Part VII (no SC number), Part VII, f. 45 (probably confused with Brown and Robbins (1943)
XCarleton Fairchild Brown, and Rossell Hope Robbins. The Index of Middle English Verse. New York: Printed for the Index Society by Columbia University Press, 1943
6340 which is also on the Passion and has similar folio number).
_description: A remembrance of the Passion — six lines

CamStJohn62.First Lines:
Loverd þi passionwo þe þenchet arist þar
                    on…
